column3: Faculty of Business, Law and Tourism
column5: The course prepares you for senior roles, your aim is to accelerate your progress towards well-paid positions of leadership. On completion of the first term, you can transfer to a range of postgraduate courses, including:MSc Finance and ManagementMA MarketingMSc Human Resource ManagementMSc International Business ManagementMSc Tourism and EventsMSc Tourism and HospitalityLLM LawLLM Criminal Law and Procedure LLM International Human Rights LLM Commercial Law and International TradePlease click 'apply now' to see which courses are currently open for application.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
